name: Lost Garden
description:
Commander! The Garden of Humanity has been destroyed, seek final revenge on this bullet hell singleplayer shoot-them-up!

WASD + Spacebar for combat.

Initial version of the game for Lost In Space GameJam.
Created by Timmay and Kantuva.

There's no need to download the game files, game can be played from this direct Core URL:
https://www.coregames.com/games/c015bc/lost-garden
